sentences.en: A new process for whole malt beer production is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种全麦芽啤酒生产的新工艺.

sentences.en: A soft fire makes sweet malt.
Dan be divided into pure malt scotch and miscellaneous two kinds.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰威士忌可分为纯麦芽以及渗杂两种.

sentences.en: Gabriel's nose was greeted by an atmosphere laden with the sweet smell of new malt.
sentences.cn: 加布里埃尔的鼻子嗅到了一股新麦芽的甜滋滋的气息.

sentences.en: German beer has traditionally been made from just four ingredients — hops, malt, yeast and water.
sentences.cn: 德国啤酒传统上只用4种原料——啤酒花、麦芽、酵母和水。

sentences.en: He poured himself another generous measure of malt.
sentences.cn: 他又为自己倒了满满一大杯麦芽威士忌。

sentences.en: I got a bottle of my best malt out of the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 我从餐具柜里取出一瓶自己收藏的最好的麦芽威士忌。

sentences.en: It is brewed from malt and hops.
sentences.cn: 它用麦精和蛇麻草酿成.

sentences.en: Monoclonal cIg was found in 49.7 % cases of 199 cases and 100 % in MALT lymphoma.
sentences.cn: 199例中单克隆性cIg检出率为49.7%,在MALT淋巴瘤为100%.

sentences.en: Objective To summarize the experiences in diagnosis and treatment of mucosa associated lymphoid tissue ( MALT ) lymphoma.
sentences.cn: 目的总结胃肠粘膜相关淋巴组织 ( MALT ) 淋巴瘤的诊治体会及经验.
文火煮出好麦芽糖.(慢工出细活. )

sentences.en: The histological characteristic of testicular MALT -- oma are similar to gastrointestine MALT -- oma.
sentences.cn: 组织学上与胃肠道MALT -oma 相似.

sentences.en: Water, malt, hop and yeast are main components of the beer production process.
sentences.cn: 泉水、麦芽、啤酒花和酵母是啤酒酿制过程中的主要成分。
威士忌是以麦芽蒸馏而成的.

sentences.en: Yes, I enjoyed the single malt they gave me, but I enjoyed the conversation much more.
sentences.cn: 不错，我喜欢这种特别的麦芽酒，但是我更喜欢这种形式的聊天。

sentences.en: You may like a Malt whisky that is peatier, or smokier, or sweeter, or whatever.
sentences.cn: 你可能想来一杯麦芽威士忌，炭香味重些的、烟熏味重些的或者更甘甜些的，或者什么别的口味的。

sentences.en: Zinc ions in beer came from malt, rice, brewing water and wort.
sentences.cn: 啤酒中的锌离子来源于麦芽 、 大米 、 酿造用水、酒花.

words.tran_cn: 麦芽制造者；麦芽出售者
作成麦芽；用麦芽处理（malt的过去式）

trans.tran_cn: 麦芽的；含麦芽的，用麦芽作的
麦芽，麦芽酒，啤酒，麦乳精
trans.tran_en: grain, usually  barley  , that has been kept in water for a time and then dried. It is used for making beer,  whisky  etc.

trans.tran_cn: 把…制成麦芽； 变成麦芽
